level.text: There is established an Advisory Board on Vocational Education and Skills Training comprised of the following:
President of UDC, or a representative thereof, who shall serve as Chairperson of the Advisory Board;
Chairperson of the Apprenticeship Council, or a representative thereof;
Chairperson of the Board of Education, or a representative thereof;
Chairperson of the Council Committee on Education, Libraries, and Recreation, or a representative thereof;
Chairperson of the Council Committee on Public Services, or of that Council committee with purview over the Department of Employment Services, or a representative thereof;
Director of the Department of Employment Services, or a representative thereof;
Chairperson of the Youth Investment Committee of the District of Columbia Workforce Investment Board, or a representative thereof;
Mayor, or a representative thereof; and
Superintendent of DCPS, or a representative thereof.
The Advisory Board shall submit to the Council and to the Mayor a short-term plan as described in ยง 38-1208.04.
